profile.description: Software Engineer specializing in AI application development and system architecture

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a software engineer specializing in Python, JavaScript, and cloud service development. With over 5 years of full-stack development experience, I'm proficient in React, Django, Flask and other frameworks. Currently focused on AI application development and system architecture design.

contact.title: Contact Info
contact.message: Welcome to contact me via LinkedIn or professional platforms

items.description: Responsible for AI application system development and architecture design. Main work includes: designing and implementing RAG systems, developing AI chatbots, building microservice architecture, and optimizing system performance.

Participated in multiple Web application project development. Mainly responsible for front-end and back-end integration, API design, database optimization, and user interface design. Successfully delivered multiple enterprise-level application systems.

aiChat.title: AI Smart Q&A
aiChat.subtitle: Chat with my AI agent to learn more about my professional experience and skills
aiChat.description: This is an AI agent demo powered by RAG technology. You can ask questions about my professional skills, project experience, etc.
aiChat.notice: Note: This is a demo version, answers are based on predefined resume data
